.. highlight:: shell

============
Configuration
============

Obtaining tokens is optional!

Ngrok
--------------

https://ngrok.com

https://dashboard.ngrok.com/get-started/your-authtoken - get token

copy

"ngrok_token"


ipstack.com
--------------

https://ipstack.com


bitly
--------------
https://bitly.com

https://app.bitly.com/settings/api/ - get token
